text: Balistes dubius is an extinct species of Miocene triggerfish in the genus Balistes. == Description == The paleoart of Balistes dubius on the left shows that this small triggerfish was probably medium turquoise in color. However, not much info is known about this tetraodontiform fish. * * == Related pages == * Balistes vegai == References == Category:Extinct fish Category:Tetraodontiformes
title: Balistes dubius
